headline: Is Clorox (CLX) Attractively Priced After Recent Rebound And Long Term Share Price Slump
summary: If you are wondering whether Clorox is attractively priced right now, the stock's recent moves and current valuation checks offer some clear signals to work through. Clorox last closed at US$108.86, with returns of 8.2% over the past week, 4.7% over the last 30 days, 7.9% year to date and a 29.0% decline over the past year, alongside an 18.5% decline over 3 years and a 35.1% decline over 5 years. Recent coverage around Clorox has focused on how investors are reassessing the company after...
